hold something over.translation[0].defin: to do or deal with something at a later time
The matter was held over for further review.
Hold over is usually passive in this meaning
to use something bad that you know about someone to make them do what you want

if a play, film, concert etc is held over, it is shown for longer than planned because it is very popular
